name: Loneshot forest playtest
description:
Please give feedback either in the comments or the feedback form (much preferred) linked here:    https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSeiwbNQiZxtKk0YD65t8vCN_AIBjWBBDEs-e1OL...

Controls:

WASD - move

Left click - shoot

Right click - grab

Space bar - dash

To fullscreen press alt+enter

The game autosaves when you close it.
